mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, price, stock_quantity, status, created_at, updated_at FROM products ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock_quantity = #{stock}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
